Class President's and Masochism Girl's Yuri

title.en: Dogs and the Brave Are Not Showy

altTitles.en: Dogs and Heroes Don't Dress Up

description.en: Summoned to another world to defeat the demon king, Satou Sousuke, 18 years old and only finished elementary school, is brought back to his world after several years had passed. While unable to find employment anywhere and living off a part-time job, Sousuke encounters a battle between a magician and a demon he thought didn’t exist on earth! He easily defeated the demon, so being marked for his power he’s involved in Demon subjugation?!

altTitles.ja: 最強の王様、二度目の人生は何をする？

altTitles.es-la: La Vida Después de la Muerte

description.de:
In einer Welt regiert durch die stärksten Kämpfer ist König Grey der unangefochten Stärkste, Reichste und Berühmteste. Aber eine solche Macht kommt Hand in Hand mit Einsamkeit. Unter der glamourösen Erscheinung eines mächtigen Königs liegt die leere Hülle eines Mannes, beraubt von Ziel und Willen.

Nach einer Wiedergeburt in eine Welt voller Magie und Monster hat der König die Möglichkeit, sein Leben erneut zu leben. Die Fehler seiner Vergangenheit zu korrigieren wird aber nicht seine einzige Herausforderung sein. Unter dem Frieden und Reichtum dieser neuen Welt lauert etwas, das alles vernichten kann, was er jemals erreicht hat, was seine Rolle darin und den Grund für seine Wiedergeburt in Frage stellt.
description.en:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
description.fr:
Le Roi Grey a une force, une richesse et un prestige inégalés dans un monde gouverné par l'aptitude martiale. Cependant, la solitude s'approche de près derrière ceux ayant de grands pouvoirs. Sous l'apparence glamour d'un Roi puissant se cache la carapace de l'homme, dépourvue de volonté et de but.

Réincarné dans un nouveau monde rempli de monstres et de magie, le Roi a une seconde chance de revivre sa vie. Cependant, corriger les erreurs de sa précédente vie ne sera pas sa seule tâche. Sous la paix et la prospérité de ce nouveau monde se cache une menace sous-jacente remettant en question tout ce pour quoi il a travaillé, son rôle, et sa raison de renaître.
description.ja: 私は史上最強の「王」である。数多の敵を退け、数々の功績を残した歴代最高の覇王だ。 しかし、ある朝目覚めた私は奇妙な違和感を覚える。手足が短い、視界が極端に低い、見知らぬ男女が私を「アーサー」と呼び、微笑みながら覗き込む。そう…私は無力な赤子に転生してしまったのだ！最強の王様がいたいけな赤ちゃんに転生する、痛快冒険ファンタジー‼
description.pl:
Król Gray ma niezrównaną siłę, bogactwo i prestiż w świecie rządzonym przez umiejętności walki. Jednak samotność pozostaje tuż za tymi, którzy mają wielką moc. Pod olśniewającą powierzchownością potężnego króla kryje się skorupa człowieka, pozbawionego celu i woli.

Wskrzeszony w nowym świecie wypełnionym magią i potworami, król ma drugą szansę na ponowne przeżycie swojego życia. Jednak naprawienie błędów przeszłości nie będzie jego jedynym wyzwaniem. Pod pokojem i dobrobytem nowego świata kryje się ukryty nurt, który grozi zniszczeniem wszystkiego, na co pracował, kwestionując jego rolę i powód narodzin na nowo.
description.ru: Король Грей обладает непревзойденной силой, богатством и престижем в мире, во главе которого стоит боевая мощь. Однако одиночество обычно появляется именно у тех, кто обладает большой властью. Мало кто знает, но под гламурной внешностью могущественного короля скрывается оболочка человека, лишённого цели и воли.
description.pt-br:
Dizem que a solidão acompanha aqueles com grande poder. Permanecendo como um Rei com força incomparável, status, e fama… e muito mais. Eu, que uma vez lutei para viver, me afogava em meu raso trono sem nenhuma vontade ou propósito. Haviam muitos que tinham inveja de mim, mas eu diria de bom grado, “Tirem tudo de mim! Será meu presente!” Um dia, eu finalmente consegui meu presente – uma nova vida.

Com uma segunda chance de corrigir meus erros e cumprir meus arrependimentos, permita-me mostrar a você o que um (ex-rei) pode fazer!

title.en: I'm a Childhood Friend, and I Want to Remain a Supporting Character, but for Some Reason I Became the Heroine's Love Interest

altTitles.ja: 幼馴染のわたしはモブでいたいのに、なぜかヒロインの恋愛対象になっている

description.en:
Yukitsuki Mashiro has been reincarnated into the world of a dating game. She decides to live an inconspicuous life as one of the heroines, "Amatsuki Suzuna," but after she helps "Hinase Riri" who is being harassed by a man in the downtown area, she becomes the target of love. What will become of Suzuna, who is surrounded by more and more heroines as everything she does goes wrong...?!

Japanese Web Novel: https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1873ib/?p=1

title.en: My Ex-Husband Wants to Remarry Again

altTitles.zh-ro: Qianfu You You You Xiang Fuhunle

altTitles.es: El ex-esposo quiere casarse de nuevo

description.en: Ye Linghan’s wish to remarry his ex-husband, Ji Ran, turned the latter from an Alpha to an Omega. Despite enduring the physical changes and the pain of rejection, Ji Ran also endured Ye Linghan’s repeated hurtful behavior. When Ye Linghan finally divorced him, Ji Ran was left heartbroken. As for Ye Linghan, he got what he wanted, but upon looking at the empty villa, he suddenly came to his senses.

Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
description.fr:
Taiki Inomata, membre du club de badminton, a eu le coup de foudre pour Chinatsu Kano, la star du club de basket de son établissement. Il s'entraîne à ses côtés tous les matins. Sa relation avec Chinatsu va prendre un tournant totalement inédit lorsqu'un jour de printemps, une nouvelle des plus déconcertantes va lui offrir une opportunité inespérée de conquérir sa belle.

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Delcourt/Tonkam**
description.ja: バドミントン部に所属する猪股大喜（いのまたたいき）は、女子バスケ部の先輩・鹿野千夏（かのちなつ）に恋をしていた――。自主練を真摯に取り組む姿に心惹かれていたが、思いもよらぬ事実が発覚し…!?　道のりは遠く、想いは近く。
description.kk: Тайки Иномата - спортқа терең бағытталған Еймей орта және жоғары мектебінің бадминтон тобында ойнайды. Ол әр таң сайын мектеп спортзалында онымен бірге жаттығатын Чинацу Кано атты үздік баскетболшы сенпайға ғашық. Бір күні олардың қарым - қатынасы өзгеріске ұшырап, арасындағы қашықтық жойыла бастады... Осылай, көктемнің бір кезінде мектеп спорт залында тағы да бір махаббат, спорт және жастық шақ оқиғасы басталды.
description.tl: Si Taiki Inomata ay nasa boys' badminton team na sports powerhouse ng Eimei Junior at Senior High. In love siya sa basketball player na si Chinatsu Kano, ang babaeng mas matanda sa kaniya na kasama niya magpraktis kada umaga sa gym. Isang araw, ang kanilang relasyon ay biglang nagbago.
description.uk:
Тайкі Іномата — учасник команди з бадмінтону, який вчиться у школі Еймей. Щодня він намагається прийти до школи якомога раніше, але його завжди випереджає Чінацу Кано, в яку він закоханий.

Чінацу — зірка команди з баскетболу. Хоч Тайкі добре грає в бадмінтон, він далеко не настільки популярний, як Чінацу, що робить шанси на взаємну симпатію низькими. Але за дивним поворотом долі Чінацу починає жити в його будинку.
description.vi:
Taiki Inomata, năm ba sơ trung, là thành viên của đội cầu lông. Kể từ khi tập luyện cùng với đội cầu lông, cậu luôn cố đến sớm nhất có thể, thế nhưng, cậu chỉ là người thứ hai đến nhà đa năng. Bởi vì người đầu tiên luôn đến sớm nhất, chính là Chinatsu Kano, năm nhất cao trung, và là người mà cậu thích.

Vì sự chênh lệch giữa mức độ nổi tiếng mà cậu cảm thấy mình không thể kéo gần khoảng cách với cô ấy. Thế nhưng...

Vào một ngày đẹp trời, vì chuyện gia đình, Chinatsu Kano đã đến sống chung với Taiki Inomata.

Với cơ hội ngàn năm có một này, với cái flag romcom to hơn núi Phú Sĩ này, liệu rằng cậu chàng Taiki có thể làm nên chuyện hay không?
description.es-la: Taiki Inomata forma parte del equipo masculino de bádminton en el prestigioso instituto deportivo Eimei Junior y Senior High. Su corazón late por Chinatsu Kano, la hábil jugadora de baloncesto con la que comparte entrenamientos matutinos en el gimnasio. En un día primaveral, su relación da un giro sorprendente… Y así se inicia esta nueva serie que combina amor, deportes y la efervescencia de la juventud.
description.pt-br: Taiki Inomata está na equipe de Badminton dos meninos na Powerhouse Esportiva Eimei Junior e Senior High. Ele está apaixonado por jogador de basquete Chinatsu Kano, a menina mais velha que ele treina ao lado de todas as manhãs no ginásio. Um dia de primavera, seu relacionamento tem uma virada acentuada ... e assim começa esta nova série de amor, esportes e jovens!

title.en: On My Way To See My Mom

altTitles.en: On the Way to Meet Mom

description.en:
Mori, a child found by a rescue team in an abandoned house, wakes up in a shelter. While adapting to an unfamiliar life, one day, he begins to be looked after with unconditional love from a mysterious sponsor... And then Mori learns about the existence of a "mom" when a close friend leaves with hers. The child starts to wonder about the sponsor: "Could this person... be my mom?"
This is the story of Mori's long and challenging journey to find his mom.
description.ko: 폐가에서 발견된 아이 '모리'는 구조대에 의해 보호소에서 눈을 뜬다. 익숙하지 않은 생활에 적응하던 어느 날 후원자에게 조건 없는 사랑을 받고 자라는데.. 친하게 지내던 친구가 엄마와 떠나고, 엄마라는 존재가 있다는 걸 알게 된 아이는 생각한다. 혹시 이 사람이.. 나의 엄마가 아닐까? 모리의 멀고도 험한 엄마 만나러 가는 이야기.

description.en: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
description.ko:
인간을 멸시하는 구미호 연은 우연히 인간인 동이의 도움을 받아 사고를 면하게 된다.

본디 구미호란 은혜를 입으면 갚아야만 하는 존재.
연은 보은을 위해 하루도 거르지 않고 동이를 찾아가고, 동이는 그런 연이 부담스럽기만 하다.

절대 가까워질 수 없을 것 같던 둘은 서로의 상처와 결핍을 알고, 채워주며 좋은 감정을 키워나가는데...

살아온 환경도, 종족도, 사랑하는 방식마저 다른 둘. 구미호와 인간의 사랑은 과연 행복한 결말로 맺어질 수 있을까?

description.en: Sheryl lives in a city full of dangers that most people do not notice.

altTitles.ja: 女ともだちと結婚してみた。

altTitles.zh: 尝试与女性朋友结婚了

altTitles.zh-hk: 嘗試與女性朋友結婚了

altTitles.th: คุณเพื่อนคะลองมาแต่งงานกันมั้ย

description.en:
Two women who are just friends make a pact… "If both of us are still single in 5 years, let's get married." Five years later, they meet again, and their married life begins.  
  
[Serialised in Yuri Hime starting in November 2020.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-10-17/donuts-under-a-crescent-moon-shio-usui-launches-new-manga-in-november/.165322)
description.ja: 「5年後お互い独り身だったら結婚しよう」そんな友達との約束が実を結び、結婚することになったくるみと瑠璃子。恋人だったわけじゃない”ともだち”同士の二人の結婚生活は、何から何まで初めてづくし。
description.ko:
"5년 후에도 독신이면 우리 둘이 결혼하자.”
‘친구’와의 약속이 결실을 맺어, 결혼하게 된 쿠루미와 루리코.
연인이 아닌 ‘친구’끼리의 결혼.
두 사람의 결혼생활은 하나부터 열까지 서툴기만 하다.
약지에 끼워진 결혼 반지가 언제쯤 익숙해질지......
그것은 앞으로 두 사람에게 달려있다.
description.pt-br:
Duas mulheres que são apenas 
amigas fazem uma promessa... 
"Se nós duas ainda estivermos 
solteiras em 5 anos, vamos nos 
casar." Cinco anos depois, elas se 
reencontram, e as suas vidas 
de casadas começa.

description.en:
The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!!

(Source: niconico Manga, translated)
___
[Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
description.id: Si protagonis, Kuroto Hinata, mencari-car adiknya yang seharusnya "pernah ada" tapi kini telah dilupakan semua orang yang ada di sekelilingnya. Dia menerima surat dari murid pindahan cantik, Shiroi Shiuku, yang bertuliskan, "kalo kamu ingin tahu keberadaan adikmu, datanglah ke perpustakaan sepulang sekolah." Saat Kuroto ke perpustakaan, dia menemui Shiroi entah kenapa setengah telanjang menunggu dirinya.
description.ja:
黒戸日向(ルビ：くろどひなた)は“かつて存在した”妹のことを探している。そんな日向のもとに転校生の白井下月(ルビ：しろいしづく)から手紙が届く。

「妹の行方について知りたかったら放課後、図書室まで」

日向は手紙を手に図書室に行くと、そこには半裸の下月が待っていた――。

altTitles.fa: من یک قطعه درجه اسطوره ای بدست آوردم

description.en:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
description.ko:
D급 무투계 레이더,
최강의 귀속 아이템으로
세계를 구할 신의 대적자가 되다!
description.ru: Я получил единственный в мире мифический предмет. Но что? Этот предмет принадлежит мне?

title.en: Shuu ni Ichido Classmate wo Kau Hanashi ~Futari No Jikan, Iiwake No Gozen'en~

altTitles.ja: 週に一度クラスメイトを買う話～ふたりの時間、言い訳の五千円～

altTitles.en: A Story About Buying a Classmate Once a Week: 5,000 Yen for an Excuse to Spend Time Together

altTitles.ko: 일주일에 한 번 클래스메이트를 사는 이야기 ~두 사람의 시간, 변명의 오천 엔~

description.en: Once a week, Miyagi pays 5,000 yen to her classmate Sendai. The 5,000 yen is to buy three hours of Sendai's time, which gives the right for Miyagi to give her orders. Miyagi is at the bottom of the school caste while Sendai is at the top. The two, who never crossed paths at school, spend time together after school under such a contract. Miyagi's orders are determined by her mood of the day, and Sendai cannot disobey. One day after school... Miyagi calls Sendai to her room and gives her an order that she usually does not give.
description.ja:
クラスメイトの宮城から、週に一度五千円でどんな“命令”でも聞くことになった仙台。陰キャ女子と陽キャ女子、学校では交わらない二人の関係は、密室の部屋の中で少しずつエスカレートしていく…。

『仙台さんの役目は、私の言うことを聞くことだから』

ゲームの相手から宿題の代行…、やがて宮城の肌に仙台の唇が触れて…。
description.es-la: Una vez a la semana, Miyagi paga 5.000 yenes a su compañera de clase Sendai.Los 5.000 yenes son para comprar tres horas de tiempo de Sendai, lo que da derecho a Miyagi a darle órdenes.Miyagi está en la parte baja de la casta escolar mientras que Sendai está en la alta. Las dos, que nunca se han cruzado en la escuela, pasan tiempo juntas después de clase bajo este contrato.Las órdenes de Miyagi vienen determinadas por su estado de ánimo del día, y Sendai no puede desobedecerlas.Un día después de clase... Miyagi llama a Sendai a su habitación y le da una orden que no suele dar.

altTitles.ja: カナン様はあくまでチョロい

altTitles.vi: Ác quỷ Kanan dễ đối phó thật đấy

description.en: Kanan is a demon hiding in a high school in the human world to feed on the souls of humans. She sets her sights on a single high school boy, but somehow ends up in a lovers contract with him!? Kanan, who has never been in love, is now filled with new feelings!
description.ja: 人間の魂を喰らうべく、人間界の高校に潜伏する女悪魔・カナン。一人の男子高校生に狙いを定めるが、気づけばなぜか恋人契約を結ぶことに！？ しかし恋なんてしたことのないカナンには、未知な感情ばかりで…！ 甘酸っぱい青春とギャグの嵐！！
description.tr: Kanan, ruhları sömürmek adına liseye sızan dişi bir iblis. Erkek bir öğrenciyi avı olarak seçer ancak... her nasıl oluyorsa ardından kız arkadaşı olmayı kabul eder!? Daha önce aşkı hiç tatmamış olan Kanan, bilinmedik duygularla dolup taşıyor! Saf kalpli iblisimizin ilk aşkını anlatan sevimli romantik komedi başlıyor!
description.vi: Kanan là một con quỷ ẩn náu trong một trường trung học ở thế giới loài người để ăn linh hồn của con người. Cô ấy để ý đến một nam sinh trung học duy nhất, nhưng bằng cách nào đó lại kết thúc với một hợp đồng tình nhân với anh ta !? Kanan, người chưa từng yêu, giờ đang tràn ngập cảm xúc mới! Bộ truyện hài lãng mạn về mối tình đầu của một con quỷ có trái tim thuần khiết, bắt đầu!
description.es-la: Kanan es un demonio femenino que se esconde en un instituto del mundo humano para alimentarse de almas humanas. Se fija en uno de los chicos del instituto, pero de alguna manera acaba firmando un contrato de amante con él. Pero Kanan, que nunca se ha enamorado, está llena de emociones desconocidas... ¡Una tormenta de juventud agridulce y bromas! Comienza una bonita comedia romántica de primer amor sobre una Akuma de corazón puro...
description.pt-br: Kanan é uma demônio que se esconde em uma escola secundária no mundo humano para se alimentar de almas humanas. Ela põe em sua mira em um dos alunos da escola mas de alguma forma acaba assinando um contrato de amante com ele! Mas Kanan que nunca esteve apaixonada antes, está cheia de emoções desconhecidas…! Começa uma comédia romântica do primeiro amor de uma Demônio!

title.en: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Kyousha no Ore ga Bishoujo Yonin to Class Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.ja: 異世界らくらくサバイバル～生存スキル強者の俺が美少女四人と暮らす無人島生活～

altTitles.ja-ro: Isekai Rakuraku Survival ~Seizon Skill Tsuwamono no Ore ga Bishoujo Shiri to Kurasu Mujintou Seikatsu~

altTitles.en: Easy Survival in Another World: With My Robust Survival Skills, I’ll Live on an Uninhabited Island with Four Beautiful Girls

description.en: More than ten years have passed since a means of transporting individuals from Earth to another world was developed. High school student Kakeru Satomi was taught survival techniques and wisdom by his mountain-dwelling grandfather. Kakeru was sent to another world together with 100 other adventurers of the same age in order to take part in a training program to become an adventurer, but the portal device that linked Earth and the other world vanished right after their transfer...!
description.ja:
地球から異世界への転移装置が誕生して10余年――。里見カケルは、山で暮らす祖父から叩き込まれたサバイバル知識とスキルを持った高校生。冒険者になるための研修に参加するため、同世代の冒険者志願者100人とともに異世界へと転移したカケルだったが、直後に地球と異世界を繋いでいたポータルが消失してしまう…！！
___
- ![Syosetsu+18](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel (R18)](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7758hj/)

title.en: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou

altTitles.ja: 塔の管理をしてみよう

altTitles.ja-ro: Tou no Kanri wo Shite Miyou

altTitles.ru: Получается, я теперь в ответе за башню

altTitles.vi: Isekai làm người quản lý tháp

description.en: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
description.ja: 仕事帰りに交通事故に遭ったことから魂が別世界に飛ばされてしまった考助。彼は保護してくれた女神の助力により、これまでの記憶を持ったまま新しい世界で生きていくことに。さらに女神が創造してくれたという、チートな能力と天使のような羽を持つ最強美女ふたりをお供に、新たな生を送ることになったのですが――。
description.es-la: Kosuke es atropellado por un camión mientras regresaba del trabajo. En ese momento, mientras su vida terminaba, su alma fue transferida al "Jardín de la eterna primavera" donde lo esperaba una hermosa mujer. Ella inmediatamente lo lleva con la diosa suprema, encargada de dicho mundo. La diosa suprema le permitirá elegir entre poder entrar al ciclo de la encarnación y renacer para empezar una nueva vida o ser invocado a otro mundo, de lo cual él elige ser invocado. La diosa suprema antes de transferirlo a este nuevo mundo le otorga una habilidad divina y dos bellas y poderosas sirvientes. En este nuevo mundo, las dos chicas principales que fueron creadas por la diosa del jardín le ayudarán a encontrar el misterio detrás del mundo: una torre de mazmorra. ¿Podrá convertirse en el dueño de esta torre y administrarla?

altTitles.ja: トランスフォーマーレジェンズ

title.en: Ore no Ie ga Maryoku Spot datta Ken: Sundeiru dake de Sekai Saikyou

altTitles.fr: Ma maison est une zone de convergence magique: Uniquement en vivant là je suis le plus fort du monde

altTitles.ru: Мой дом — это место волшебной силы

altTitles.ja: 俺の家が魔力スポットだった件 ～住んでいるだけで世界最強～

altTitles.zh-hk: 原来我家是魔力点~只是住在那里就变成世界最强~

altTitles.ko: 우리 집이 마력스팟이었던 건에 대하여 ~살고 있는 것만으로 세계최강~

altTitles.pt-br: Minha casa está em um ponto mágico de poder, por morar lá eu me tornei o mais forte do mundo

altTitles.en: My House Is a Magic Power Spot: Just by Living There I Become the Strongest in the World

description.en:
Living carefree at home is the greatest shortcut—my house is the world’s greatest Magic Power Spot. That being the case, both my house and I were summoned to another world by some guys who were aiming for it. However, I’ve been living in this place for many years and my body is, apparently, abnormally overflowing with magic. Due to some unforeseen circumstances by those guys who summoned me, they quickly ran away. Be that as it may, there are still some ill-mannered people who covet the magic leaking out of my house. I won’t give up my house to those people! I’m going to wield my power as I please!
___
**Storyboarder:** [Oomine](https://mangadex.org/author/3a2b2fed-9cc9-4538-b2ca-1d563370316f)
**Character Designer:** [Nabeshima Tetsuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/9badc86b-f0ba-4f08-bc11-323ea16aae00)

**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/34698)
description.ja: 自宅でのんびりすることが、最強への近道だった――。強力な魔力スポットの上に建つ一軒家に住んでいた普通の青年ダイチ。 ある日、それを狙うやつらに家ごと異世界に召喚されてしまう!!　だが、長年魔力スポットに住み続け、魔力が貯めこまれたダイチは敵を一蹴！　さらにかわいい我が家の精霊サクラも現れて至れり尽くせり！　最強の魔力を持ったダイチが望むものはただ一つ――それは自宅で平穏に暮らすこと！
description.ru:
Жить беззаботно в своём доме — это, несомненно, великолепно. Но мой дом — самое большое в мире место волшебной силы. Каким-то образом вышло так, что меня с моим домом перенесло в другой мир. Выяснилось, что меня призвали какие-то парни, которые хотели присвоить магию моего дома себе. Тем не менее, я живу в этом месте в течение многих лет, и мое тело, по-видимому, аномально переполнено магией. Из-за каких-то непредвиденных обстоятельств те ребята, которые меня вызвали, быстро убежали. Как бы то ни было, все ещё есть невоспитанные люди, которые жаждут магии, просачивающейся из моего дома. Я не отдам свой дом никому! Я буду использовать свою силу, как захочу!   

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5915da/) (Raw)
description.es-la: Vivir sin preocupaciones en casa es el mejor atajo: mi casa es el mayor punto de poder mágico del mundo. Siendo ese el caso, tanto mi casa como yo fuimos invocados a otro mundo. Sin embargo, he estado viviendo en este lugar durante muchos años y aparentemente mi cuerpo está desbordado magia. Debido a circunstancias imprevistas por parte de los tipos que me invocaron, huyeron rápidamente. Como sea, todavía hay algunas personas mal educadas que codician la magia que escapa de mi casa. ¡No voy a ceder mi casa a esas personas! ¡Voy a ejercer mi poder como me plazca!
description.pt-br: Viver despreocupado em casa é a melhor coisa... minha casa é o maior ponto de força mágica do mundo. Sendo esse o caso, tanto minha casa quanto eu fomos convocados para outro mundo por algumas pessoas que estavam visado isso. No entanto, eu moro neste lugar há muitos anos e meu corpo está, aparentemente, transbordando de forma anormal com a magia. Devido a algumas circunstâncias imprevistas por aquelas pessoas que me chamaram, elas rapidamente fugiram. Seja como for, ainda há algumas pessoas mal-educadas que cobiçam a magia que vaza da minha casa. Eu não vou desistir da minha casa para essas pessoas! Vou usar meu poder como quiser!

description.en:
Is my cursed husband's fate up to me?
Madelyn's husband Ian was left broken after the war, and in turn, made her life a living hell. Fleeing her doomed marriage, she meets a tragic end. But when she opens her eyes, she finds herself at 17 again. The war has yet to start, and Madelyn can still change her fate. But what about Ian?
description.pt-br:
O destino do meu maldito marido depende de mim?
O marido de Madelyn, Ian, ficou destroçado depois da guerra e, por sua vez, tornou a vida dela um inferno. Fugindo de seu casamento condenado, ela encontra um fim trágico. Mas quando ela abre os olhos, ela se vê novamente com 17 anos. A guerra ainda não começou e Madelyn ainda pode mudar o seu destino. Mas e Ian?

description.en: A semi-autobiographical account of the author as she experiences abuse, sexual and otherwise, at the hands of her family who are also deeply religious. Aiko wished for someone to kill her and the world she lives in. With the Great Hanshin Earthquake, the Aleph doomsday cult, and the Kobe child murders, it seemed like the ends of time was approaching. Unable to dream of "somewhere away from here", all she can do is face her violent life head-on.
description.es-la: Historia semi-autobiográfico de la autora mientras sufre abusos sexuales y otro tipo de cosas, a manos de su familia, que también es profundamente religiosa. Aiko deseaba que alguien acabara con ella y con el mundo en el que vive. Con el Gran Terremoto de Hanshin, la secta del Juicio Final Aleph y los asesinatos de niños de Kobe, parecía que se acercaba el fin de los tiempos. Incapaz de soñar con "algún lugar lejos de aquí", lo único que puede hacer es enfrentarse de frente a su violenta vida.

title.en: Kamiina Botan, Yoeru Sugata wa Yuri no Hana.

altTitles.en: Kamiina Botan, the Drunken Form is a Lily Flower

altTitles.ja: 上伊那ぼたん、酔へる姿は百合の花

description.en:
Kamiina Botan is a 20-year-old college student.   
At the welcome party for the dorm she was assigned to, the dorm leader Ibuki gives her a highball to drink and she becomes tipsy, leading to her involvement with Ibuki from now on…  
A tipsy teasing girl's comedy!  
  
Official Manga Twitter: [@Kamiina Botan](https://twitter.com/kamiinabotan)
description.ja: 二十歳の大学生・上伊那ぼたんは酔うと少し大胆になってドキッとする一言を…? これが令和の“読むアルコール”。 上伊那ぼたんに酔いしれましょ。

description.en: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?
description.ru: Продолжение великой эпопеи "Баки". 6-я номерная серия тайтла, которая поведает нам нереальную историю сражения Джека Хаммера и доисторического человека Пикла!!!
description.tr: Büyük destan Bucky'nin devamı. Jack Hammer ve tarih öncesi adam Pickle arasındaki savaşın gerçek dışı hikayesini anlatacak olan Baki'nin 6 numaralı serisidir!!!
description.pt-br: Jack derrubou o mundo do sumô, agora ele irá desafiar a todos para seu torneio. Desta vez uma nova jornada.

altTitles.en: The Girl Who Can See Them

altTitles.th: มิเอรุโกะจัง ใครว่าหนูเห็นผี

altTitles.de: Mieruko-chan - Die Geister, die mich riefen

description.en:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](http://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
description.ja: ある日突然、普通の人には見えない異形な存在が見えるようになってしまった「みこ」。彼女は彼らから逃げるでもなく、立ち向かうでもなく…精一杯シカトしつづける事に。
description.ru: Мико — старшеклассница, проклятая шестым чувством; у нее есть способность видеть призраков- Она пытается жить обычной жизнью, но трудно, когда призраки продолжают преследовать ее- Она также может видеть души людей, и она понимает, что люди — настоящие монстры.В один «прекрасный» день старшеклассница внезапно начала видеть призраков! Она не может от этого избавиться, но изо всех сил старается вести себя так, будто вообще их не видит. История девушки с шестым чувством начинается!
description.uk: В один “прекрасний” день старшокласниця раптово почала бачити привидів! Вона не може від цього позбутися, але з усіх сил намагається поводитися так, ніби взагалі їх не бачить.

title.en: Uchi ni Kaeru to Itsumo Kukkoro ga Iru

altTitles.ja: 家に帰るといつもくっころが居る

altTitles.id: Saat Pulang ke Rumah, Selalu Ada Kucing yang Ada di Sana.

description.en: A high school student planning to live alone decides to rent a "stigmatized property" where the ghost of a female knight appears!

Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
description.es: Bocchi The Rock! cuenta la historia de Goto Hitori, una chica de secundaria que empieza a aprender a tocar la guitarra persiguiendo su sueño de formar parte de una banda. Pese a que es muy dedicada, su arrolladora timidez le impide poder conseguir siquiera una amiga. Pero cuando conozca a Ijichi Nijika, una baterista que está buscando una nueva guitarrista para su grupo, Goto dará el primer paso para cumplir su gran sueño página a página, tira a tira.
description.it:
Hitori Goto è una liceale che inizia a imparare a suonare la chitarra perchè il suo sogno è di entrare a far parte di una band, 
ma è talmente timida da non avere nemmeno un amico. 
Ma il suo sogno potrebbe avverarsi in seguito all'incontro con Nijika Ijichi, una ragazza che suona la batteria 
ed è alla ricerca proprio di un chitarrista per la band in cui suona.
description.ja: 「ぼっちちゃん」こと後藤ひとりは、ギターを愛する孤独な少女。家で一人寂しく弾くだけの毎日でしたが、ひょんなことから伊地知虹夏が率いる「結束バンド」に加入することに。人前での演奏に不慣れな後藤は、立派なバンドマンになれるのか――！？全国のぼっちな少年少女に届ける、いま最高にアツい音楽漫画！！陰キャならロックをやれ！！！
description.pt-br:
Hitori Gotou é uma colegial que está começando a aprender a tocar violão porque sonha em fazer parte de uma banda, mas é tão tímida que não fez um único amigo. No entanto, seu sonho pode se tornar realidade depois que ela conhece Nijika Ijichi, uma garota que toca bateria e está procurando um novo guitarrista para sua banda.

[ 1° TEMP.  DO ANIME ADAPTOU ATÉ: Vol. 2, Cap 21. ]

description.en: "Angels"... are heroes who follow the will of the Goddess and protect the Quartz Kingdom from demons. Blue, an orphan born with dark wings, lives a peaceful life, dreaming of becoming an angel. But one day, after meeting a prince, her destiny begins to change.
description.ja: 「天使」ーー彼らは女神の意思に従い、クオーツ王国を悪魔から守る英雄。黒い翼をもって生まれた孤児のブルーは、天使を夢見る平和な毎日を送っていた。だがとある日、とある王子との出会いを境に、彼女の運命は動き出す。
description.ru: «Ангелы»... это герои, следующие воле Богини и защищающие Кварцевое Королевство от демонов. Блю, сирота, родившаяся с тёмными крыльями, живет мирной жизнью, мечтая стать ангелом. Но в один день, после встречи с принцем, её судьба начинает меняться.
description.es-la:
«Ángeles»… Aquellos que han heredado la voluntad de la diosa serán los héroes que protegerán al Reino del Cuarzo de los demonios. 

En estos pacíficos días una huérfana llamada Blue que nació portando alas negras, sueña con convertirse en un ángel. Sin embargo cierto día su destino cambiará luego de encontrarse con cierto príncipe.

altTitles.fr: Le chevalier qui ne vit qu'aujourd'hui

description.en: Is dying repeatedly a blessing? Enkrid's life-long dream of becoming a knight looked to be forever out of reach, until one day he died... and woke up at the beginning of that same day! Now that he has unlimited chances to train and engage in mortal combat, just how far can he go?
description.pt-br: "Você é um gênio." Essas palavras que ele ouviu quando era criança eram veneno. Encrid sonhava em ser um cavaleiro, mas logo percebeu que era fútil. "Quer viver pela espada com esse nível de habilidade?" Uns davam risada dele. "Apenas desista." Outros aconselhavam contra. Mesmo assim, o sonho dele não morreu. Ele dormia menos, corria mais, e se esforçava pra caramba. Um dia, morreu, com uma espada perfurando sua garganta. Encrid abriu os olhos novamente para a "manhã de hoje".

altTitles.ja: GTO パラダイス・ロスト

description.en:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison!

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison.

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*Due to a change in publishers this series ended at chapter 178.5 and continued on as "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listed under the "Related" tab), picking up where the story left off.
description.pt-br:
A próxima etapa para o Grande Professor Onizuka Eikichi é... uma prisão!

Preso devido a um incidente causado em sua turma, da qual ele foi nomeado professor assistente há apenas seis meses! Uma recém-criada classe de artes performáticas na Escola Secundária Kissho Academy, feita para alunos que trabalham em diversas indústrias de mídia! Onizuka, que diz não ter nenhum arrependimento, começa a contar tranquilamente a verdade sobre o incidente na prisão.

Finalmente, a história de décadas de Eikichi Onizuka chega a uma conclusão dramática!

Devido a uma mudança de editora, essa série terminou no capítulo 178.5 e continuou como "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listado na aba "Relacionado"), retomando de onde a história parou.

altTitles.ja: 高森くんを黙らせたいっ！！

altTitles.en: I Want to Shut Up Takamori-kun!!

altTitles.vi: Đừng nghĩ thế nữa mà, Takamori-kun!

description.en: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
description.ja: 南川さんは隣の席の高森くんの「ヒミツ」を知っている。それは高森くんの心の声が聞こえるということ。そしてさらに、高森くんは南川さんのことが大好きだということ…!!毎日毎日うるさい高森くんの心の声を黙らせられるのか…!?テレパス青春ラブコメ、開幕です!!
description.vi: Một cô gái có khả năng đọc suy nghĩ người khác và cậu bạn kế bên có máu simp lỏ. Điều gì sẽ chờ đợi cả hai phía trước?

description.en: Ye Wutian, a brilliant doctor from 2089, somehow time-travels back to the year 2019 in a lab experiment explosion. He wakes up in a wild mountain, and then manages to save a girl, Li Wan'er who's been bitten by a venomous snake. With his apparently superior knowledge in medicine, Ye Wutian embarks on an amazing journey in the beginning of the 21st century…

When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.

altTitles.en: The Monster Duchess and the Contract Princess
The Monster Duchess and the Contract Lady
The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess

altTitles.pt: A duquesa monstruosa e a princesa de contrato

altTitles.vi: Bản Khế Ước Với Nữ Công Tước Ác Ma
Nữ công tước quái vật và công chúa hợp đồng

altTitles.fr: La duchesse monstrueuse et la dame du contract
La duchesse monstrueuse et la princesse par contrat

altTitles.es: La duquesa monstruosa y la princesa del contrato

altTitles.uk: Княгиня чудовиськ та принцеса за контрактом

altTitles.ru: Княгиня чудовищ и принцесса по контракту

altTitles.fa: داچس هیولا مانند و شاهزادهی قراردادی

altTitles.th: ดัชเชสปีศาจกับพันธสัญญาบุตรสาว

description.ar: كانت حياة ليزلي تستخدم دائما لتحسين شقيقتها إيلي بعد محاولة فاشلة لاستخراج السحر الأسود داخل ليزلي لنقله إلى إيلي تقرع ليزلي على باب الوحش دوقة وتنادي الدوقة لتبنيها
description.en:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
description.es: La vida de Leslie siendo la hija menor de la familia noble Sperado siempre se centró en ser usada para el beneficio de su hermana Eli, la cual es la prometida del Príncipe Heredero del reino. Tras un intento fallido de extraer la magia oscura dentro de Leslie por medio de un sacrificio para transferírsela a Eli, Leslie toca la puerta de la monstruosa Duquesa Salvatore y golpeada, moreteada y desesperada, ¡¿ y le pide a la Duquesa que la adopte?!
description.fr: Fille cadette d’une lignée aux pouvoirs extraordinaires, elle a été élevée dans l’ombre de sa soeur. Et le jour venu, elle découvre qu’elle doit périr pour elle! Pour échapper au sacrifice, une seule possibilité: se venger coûte que coûte de cette famille qui lui a tout pris. Quitte à s’allier avec une guerrière au sang de dragon.
description.it: La giovane Leslie è la figlia più giovane della nobile famiglia Sperado. Lo scopo della sua vita però è sempre stato quello di far vivere meglio la sorella, Ellie, promessa sposa del principe ereditario del regno. La sua famiglia l'ha cresciuta al solo scopo di agevolare la sorella, e un giorno la sacrifica per tentare di estrarre la magia delle ombre presente all'interno di Leslie per donarla alla sorella. Ma Leslie riesce a salvarsi la vita, solo momentaneamente... Riuscirà a cambiare il suo destino, o dovrà sacrificare la sua vita per il bene della sorella?
description.ko:
사랑받을 수 있다면 굶어도, 매를 맞아도 괜찮았다.
그러나 언니를 위한 제물로 불구덩이에 바쳐졌을 때, 그 기대는 산산조각이 났다.

"저를 입양해주세요"

불 속에서 간신히 살아남은 레슬리는 양녀로 삼을 아이를 찾고 있다는 공작을 찾아가

"제국, 아니 대륙 최고의 어둠술사를 얻으실 테니까요."

제국 유일의 공녀이자 어둠술사가 되기로 계약하는데

"레슬리, 이쪽으로 와"
"아니, 어제는 형이랑 먹었으니까 오늘은 둘째 오라버니랑 먹어야지"
"레슬리, 여기 네가 제일 좋아하는 젤리가 있단다."

졸지에 생긴 오빠들이 자기 옆에 앉아 달라며 아침마다 쟁탈전을 벌인다.
저기, 우리 그냥 계약 관계 아니었나요?
description.ru: Лесли всегда жила в угоду своей сестре, Эли. После неудачной попытки извлечь чёрную магию из превращения Лесли в Эли, Лесли стучится в дверь к Княгине чудовищ и умоляет её удочерить?!
description.tr: Leslie'nin hayatı her zaman kardeşi Eli'in iyileşmesi için kullanılmış. Kara büyüyü Leslie'den çıkarıp Elis'e transfer etme girişimi başarısız olduktan sonra, Leslie canavar Düşes'in kapısını çalar ve onu evlatlık edinmesi için yalvarır?!
description.uk: Народжена для того, щоб віддати життя за світле майбутнє сім'ї, Леслі завжди жила на догоду своїй сестрі Елі. Після невдалої спроби жертвопринесення для вилучення магії для Елі, дівчинка стукає в двері до Княгині Чудовиськ, благаючи удочерити її...
description.zh: 斯佩拉多家族的次女莱斯莉，她的人生完全是为了姐姐而活。莱斯莉忍受着来自家人的冷眼和虐待，以为可以换来关爱，直到父母为了让姐姐的力量暴增，而将她献祭。她决定逃离，并投靠整个帝国力量最强的“怪物公爵”，成为她的养女！ “请收养我吧，您将得到整个大陆最强大的黑暗魔法师！”

altTitles.en: Soara and the House of Monsters

description.en: One day a young warrior girl meets a dwarf who dedicates himself to constructing houses for monsters. A tale of building houses for myriads of creatures begins! After all, everyone needs a home.

altTitles.th: คำอธิษฐานในวันที่จากลา Frieren

altTitles.el: Φρίρεν: Πέρα από το Τέλος του Ταξιδιού

altTitles.de: Frieren: Nach dem Ende der Reise

altTitles.es-la: Frieren: Más allá del fin del viaje

description.el: Έχοντας νικήσει τον βασιλιά των δαιμόνων, το ταξίδι μιας δεκαετίας φτάνει στο τέλος του και μια νέα εποχή ειρήνης ξεκινά. Η ζωή όμως συνεχίζεται, ειδικά για την Φρίρεν, πως ως ξωτικό έχει ακόμα αιώνες ζωής μπροστά της. Με τις δεκαετίες να περνάνε, η Φρίρεν έρχεται αντιμέτωπη με την μεταβλητότητα του κόσμου και την παροδικότητα των ανθρώπων. Μετά από μια τελευταία συνάντηση με όλη την παλιά της ομάδα, συνειδητοποιεί ότι ο χρόνος που πέρασε με τους φίλους της ήταν υπερβολικά σύντομος και ότι δεν θα έχει ποτέ την ευκαιρία να τους μάθει καλύτερα. Έρχοντας αντιμέτωπη με την αλήθεια αυτή, η Φρίρεν αποφασίζει να ξεκινήσει ένα ακόμα ταξίδι αλλά αυτή τη φορά έχοντας σκοπό να μάθει το τι σημαίνει να είσαι άνθρωπος.
description.en: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
description.es: Frieren es una elfa, y como para todos los de su raza, los años pasan en un suspiro… pero no es así para sus antiguos compañeros de batalla, a los que Frieren verá morir y envejecer. De repente Frieren se da cuenta de que pese a que la vida avanza a un ritmo más lento para ella, las experiencias con sus seres queridos se le escapan de las manos. Un aire nostálgico envuelve a este manga fantástico tan entrañable que ha vendido ya más de 2,5 millones de copias en Japón.
description.fr:
Que deviennent les héros une fois le mal vaincu ?
Dans ce coffret collector : un jeu de 54 cartes entièrement personnalisé aux couleurs de la série et le manga avec une jaquette alternative réversible !

Alors que Frieren et ses compagnons font halte dans la citadelle de Heiß, Stark propose à Fern d'aller en rendez-vous, sur le ton de la plaisanterie... et contre toute attente, la jeune fille accepte ! Sur les conseils de l'elfe, qui n'y connaît pas grand-chose, le guerrier emmène donc son amie faire le tour de la ville, ce qui leur permet de se rapprocher un peu.

Après cette pause bienvenue, les trois aventuriers repartent sur les routes et arrivent au haut-plateau du Nord, une zone extrêmement dangereuse où pullulent aussi bien des monstres coriaces que des démons retors... Parviendront-ils à survivre dans cette région hostile ?
description.vi: Tổ đội anh hùng đã đánh bại được quỷ vương và kết thúc cuộc hành trình của họ. Nhưng thế chưa phải là hết, cuộc đời của cô nàng pháp sư Elf này sẽ còn rất dài, hơn cả những người đồng đội cũ của cô, một cuộc phiêu lưu mới để cô trải qua nhiều cung bậc cảm xúc, cũng như là học hỏi thêm về con người.
description.es-la: Tras cumplir su misión de derrotar al Rey Demonio, la maga elfo Frieren, el héroe Himmel, el sacerdote Heiter y el guerrero Eisen regresan a casa después de un viaje de una década donde disolverán su grupo y tomarán sus propios caminos. Pero el tiempo pasa de forma distinta para los elfos, Frieren comienza a ser testigo de como sus excompañeros sufren sus estragos y comienzan a morir lentamente y uno a uno. Antes de fallecer, Heiter el sacerdote, le impone a Frieren un aprendiz humana llamada Fern. Llevados por la afición que tiene la alfa por recolectar hechizos mágicos, ambos emprenderán una aventura, llena de magia e introspección, que los llevará a revisitar lugares que había conocido en su anterior travesía, mientras enfrenta el pesar que le causa descubrir todas las posibilidades que ha desperdiciado en su viaje que le hubiesen posibilitado entablar una relación más cercana con sus compañeros ahora fallecidos.
description.zh-hk: 在打倒了魔王的勇者一行人当中，魔法使芙莉莲是精灵，她和其他三人有不一样的地方。 生活在“之后”的世界里，她感受到了什么—— 留下来的人们所编织的葬送与祈祷又意味着什么—— 故事从“冒险的结束”开始。 这是讲述英雄们的活法的，后日谈奇幻作品！

title.en: Hacking Ghost Karada ni Shika Kachi no Nai

altTitles.ja: HACKING GHOST〜カラダにしか価値のない学園〜

description.en:
In an era where one in every twenty people awakens to a "special ability," Hiroto Takigami is a weak ability user who can only communicate with spirits. However, for some reason, his stepsister Rei, the most powerful ability user, harbors deep hatred toward him. The moment he graduates from an ability training institution and gains full control over his power, Rei kills him.

With only one year left to live—his "remaining lifespan" set—Hiroto falls into despair. Just then, a certain spirit appears before him, revealing an unexpected secret about his ability…

An unprecedented "body takeover" supernatural battle begins!
description.ja: 人類の20人に1人が「特殊能力」に目覚めた時代。霊と話せるだけの弱小能力者・滝神広人は、ある理由で最強の能力者である義姉・麗から激しく憎まれていた。能力者育成機関から卒業し、能力を自由に使役できるようになった瞬間、広人は麗によって殺される。「余命」は１年ーー。絶望する広人の前に、ある1人の霊が現れる。そこで告げられたのは、思いもよらない能力の秘密で‥‥。前代未聞の”カラダ乗っ取り系”異能バトル！

description.en:
Aki-san (50), a divorced woman, has been getting along well with Rokujo-san (60).
People around them are worried about their pure relationship, but there is no need to worry. At a summer festival, the two quickly grow closer, and their feelings for each other continue to grow.
They envision a future together, and finally....
"I want to spend the rest of my life with the person I love."
description.ru: Аки-сан (50 лет), разведённая женщина, хорошо проводит время с Рокудзё-саном (60 лет). Окружающие беспокоятся, но их отношения чисты, и беспокоиться не стоит. На летнем фестивале они быстро сближаются, и их чувства друг к другу продолжают расти. Они представляют себе совместное будущее, и, наконец... «Я хочу провести остаток жизни с любимым человеком».

title.en: The Snow Leopard Baby of the Black Leopard Family

description.en: A child, born a hybrid and abused to death by her maternal grandfather, is reborn with memories of her past life. Faced with the same fate, she seeks out her estranged father for protection until adulthood. Expecting rejection, she is instead met with love and acceptance from her father, siblings, and grandfather—who even offers her the family leadership.

Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!

altTitles.en: The Horse Princess and The Deer Prince

description.en:
Mahoro is a high school girl who loves her teacher.
She studied hard to get her teacher to like her, but as a result, she is now a college student making her debut in a rural area, and is at a loss for what to do with her life for the first time!
What will Mahoro see in the ancient city of Nara?

title.en: My Classmates Are All Very Strange

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo de Tongxue Dou Hen Qiguai

description.en:
Liao Yuqing, who’s just an ordinary female high schooler, somehow bumps into a Prince Charming-like* student on her way to school?! At the same time, the highly anticipated foreign mad dog, pretty boy student, Ryan, finally meets the frightening Demon King—Chu Feng. Surrounded by these four people, an ordinary teenage girl and her eccentric schoolmates begin living an unordinary daily life.  
  
T/N: "Prince Charming" literally translates to "White Horse Prince" in Chinese.
Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
description.ko:
유전자조작 쥐로 알려져 있는 아이 HANA(하나),
하나가 연구실에서 탈출하면서 일어나는 이야기들.

description.en:
MazinSaga is a manga written and produced by Go Nagai between 1990 and 1998; currently incomplete and up to the sixth volume, it's the summa of Nagai's works, for the complexity of the plot and the treated thematic content.  
Mazinsaga tells the story of the young Koji Kabuto, university student who finds himself having to collect the fruit of the researches of his father, physicist of world-wide reputation who died in mysterious circumstances.  
The boy is thus given a powerful artifact, Mazinger Z, the Armor of God.

Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
description.ja: 日陰者の道を歩んできた主人公・青葉。 譲れぬ“想い”を押し通すため、 総合格闘技“MMA”の世界へ飛び込んでゆく――!!
description.pt-br: Uma história sobre o mal humorado Aoba Suzuki e a estrela em ascensão Kenshin Akasawa moldando seus caminhos para o mundo das lutas de MMA.

altTitles.ja: 魔法少女ダンデライオン

description.en: A story of light and shadow where the Magical Girl, Tanpopo Ohanami, teams up with Shade, the shadow phantom who should be her enemy, to fight for the ones they love.

title.en: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.ja: 売れ残りの奴隷エルフを拾ったので、娘にすることにした

altTitles.ja-ro: Urenokori no Dorei Elf wo Hirotta no de, Musume ni suru Koto ni shita

altTitles.en: My Daughter was an Unsold Slave Elf.

altTitles.vi: Con gái tôi là tiên tộc bán ế

description.en:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!
description.ja:
絶滅したというエルフの上位種、ハイエルフの少女が売られているのを見つけたヴァイス。

購入して娘として育てることに決めた。言葉も知らないハイエルフだったがヴァイスの懸命な育児の成果がでてきて…？ 

成長が止まらないハイエルフから目が離せないっっ！

description.en:
A struggling 29-year-old single woman faces hardships due to irregular employment in her dream city, Tokyo. Hearing from a coworker that it can be a good side-income, she decides to offer her uterus to a stranger and become a surrogate mother.

(Source: Manga Mogura RE, edited)

Note: Based on the novel of the same name by Natsuo Kirino.

altTitles.en: Honkai Impact 3rd - Escape From The Sky (Book 1001)
Honkai Impact 3rd - When Kiana Play Honkai Impact (Book 1011)

description.en:
The definitive source of lore, background, and epic saga of Honkai Impact 3rd, a 3D anime-style ARPG game developed and published by miHoYo.

*History:*
- 1952: 1st Honkai Eruption in Berlin
- 2000: 2nd Honkai Eruption in Siberia
- 2014: Honkai Outbreak in Nagazora

---

Honkai is a corrupting force that manifests itself as supernatural disasters, monstrous creatures, plagues, and Herrschers who can bend physical laws on a whim. Human civilization has been at war with the Honkai since the very beginning. The Valkyries are the mightiest warriors of humanity. They are our only hope.

---

+++ Extraneous information
**Contributor note:** There currently is an ongoing cleanup with the goal of moving each book to it's own title. Help would be appreciated [[Link](https://forums.mangadex.org/threads/honkai-impact-3rd-data-fixing-cleanup.1071951)]

0.2 | Done | 2000 CE. | Second Eruption. !!2000-FEB-01: The entire research staff of Schicksal Babylon Honkai research facility in Siberia disappeared in a single night. Overseer Otto Apocalypse dispatched his 2nd in command Theresa Apocalypse to investigate this mystery. Welt and Einstein of Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, prepare for the worst. They suspect the 2nd Eruption is about to happen.!!

To wake their principal, Mei entered the stigma data space to investigate the cause. Meanwhile, Theresa woke up in what appears to be medieval Japan and find herself embroiled in a never-ending Samsara.!!
4 | Done | 2014 CE. | Final Samsara. !!A vengeful entity dwells within Theresa's innate stigma, and she must do what she can to prevent Yae Sakura's will to become forever corrupted by this ancient terror. Can Theresa defeat this monster, or will she lose herself to the endless cycle?!!
5 | Done | 2014 CE. | AE Invasion. !!Anti-Entropy, a long-time enemy of Schicksal, made an attempt to kidnap the 3rd Herrscher - Mei Raiden. Will the Valkyries of St. Freya High defeat the invaders and save each other?!!
6 | Done | 2014 CE. | Moon Shadow. !!Fu Hua and Kiana goes to Singapore to recover a rogue scientist and a stolen gem, unaware of the terrible things that might happen.!!

8 | Done | 2015 CE. | Second Key. !!Schicksal initiated tests on the Second Key they've acquired from the city of London. Durandal didn't expect to find him inside the key.!!
9 | Ongoing | 2005 / 2029 CE. | Alien Space. !!Young Himeko got into Caltech and met a surprisingly young substitute space engineering course lecturer who also happens to share her interest in space aliens.!!

title.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~

altTitles.ja: シャングリラ・フロンティア　～クソゲーハンター、神ゲーに挑まんとす～

altTitles.en: Shangri-La Frontier ~From Trash Game Hunter to God-Tier Gamer!~

altTitles.zh-hk: 香格里拉・開拓異境～糞作獵手挑戰神作～

altTitles.pt-br: Shangri-La Frontier - o caçador de jogos ruins experimenta um jogo Divino.

altTitles.ru: Рубеж Шангри-Ла: любитель игрошлака бросает вызов топ игре

description.en:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
description.ja: “クソゲー”をこよなく愛する男・陽務楽郎。彼が次に挑んだのは、総プレイヤー数3000万人の“神ゲー”『シャングリラ・フロンティア』だった!　集う仲間、広がる世界。そして“宿敵”との出会いが、彼の、全てのプレイヤーの運命を変えていく!!
description.pt:
A adaptação cômica do romance superpopular de Syosetu Ni Narou.  
  
Hizutome Rakurou adora jogos de merda. Seu próximo desafio é Shangri-la Frontier, o jogo divino com uma base de jogadores total de 30.000.000. Reunindo companheiros (ralé) em um mundo expansivo e encontrando velhos inimigos pelo caminho, ele mudará o destino de cada jogador.
description.ru: Главный герой истории — лидер таблиц рейтинга в посредственных малоизвестных VR-играх (так называемый «игрошлак») которые, тем не менее, полностью его устраивают. Но однажды он решается бросить вызов сверхпопулярной игре с 30 миллионами активных пользователей под названием «Shangri-La Frontier». Адаптация суперпопулярного романа из "Shousetsuka ni Narou".
description.pt-br:
O estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, Rakuro Hizutome, adora encontrar os chamados “jogos ruins” e dar uma surra neles. Quando ele decide mudar as coisas jogando um novo jogo de realidade virtual de “nível divino” conhecido como Shangri-La Frontier (também conhecido como SLF), ele faz o que faz de melhor: min-maxes, pula o prólogo e pula direto para Ação! Rakuro pode ser um jogador experiente, mas um encontro com um antigo rival mudará para sempre o destino de cada jogador SLF.

Vestido apenas com shorts e uma máscara de pássaro, Rakuro (nome do jogador: Sunraku) se lança no mundo do SLF. As coisas vão bem no início, quando ele derruba um duende, um coelho e até uma píton. Mas então Sunraku se depara com um lobo enorme e contundente conhecido como Lycagon, o Matador da Noite. Os anos de experiência em “jogos ruins” de Sunraku serão suficientes ou ele está prestes a sofrer um rude despertar apenas algumas horas em sua aventura SLF?

altTitles.it: Hitomi-chan è timida con gli sconosciuti

description.en: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
description.es:
Un día, el estudiante de 2do año Yuu Yusami se encuentra por accidente con una muchacha grande con una mirada temeraria. Resulta que ella símplemente lo está observando… pero ¿por qué? A pesar de que Hitomi Takano se ve espeluznante y huraña, ella en realidad es querida y adorable. Ésta será una feliz y grata comedia de la vida cotidiana.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Mangaka’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/910858)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/cyorisukenosuke)
description.fr: Un jour, Yuu Usami – lycéen ordinaire en deuxième année – rencontre une grande fille avec un regard effrayant. Elle a l’air de le fusiller du regard, mais pourquoi…?! Pourtant, même si Hitomi Takano fait peur et est maladroite, elle est en réalité une fille gentille et adorable. Bienvenue dans une comédie/tranche de vie qui va vous réchauffer le cœur !
description.ja:
どこにでもいる平凡な高校2年生の宇佐見君は、ある日、偶然に居合わせた"何やら目つきが悪くていろいろとおっきな女の子"に、なぜか睨みつけられてしまい…!?
見た目は怖くて不器用だけど、実は優しくて可愛い三白眼女子の、楽しくてハートフルな日常コメディ…開幕!!
description.ru: Однажды обыкновенный старшеклассник 2-го года Юу Усами случайно встречает большую девушку со страшным взглядом. По какой-то причине она не отрывает от него глаз, но он ведь ей ничего не делал!.. Хотя Хитоми Такано выглядит страшной и неприветливой, на самом деле она добрая и очаровательная девушка.
description.pt-br: Em um dia comum, um estudante do segundo ano do ensino médio, chamado Usami Yuu, se encontra acidentalmente com Takano Hitomi, uma garota alta e que tem um olhar assustador. Acontece que ela está olhando diretamente para ele. Mas embora Hitomi pareça assustadora e desajeitada, na verdade ela é uma garota gentil e adorável que simplesmente quer se tornar mais sociável.

altTitles.es-la: Una princesa que trabaja duro por su favorito

altTitles.en: The Princess is Secretly a Fan

description.en:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s very existence is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’
